title: It's a Baskerville similar font, narrower and with not so thin traces
content:
I am attaching the png file with the logo. Thanks a lot in advance!

Font: 

 New Baskerville 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180246/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Qualitat-logo - simples.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180246/http:/typophile.com/files/Qualitat-logo%20-%20simples_0.png) | 50.48 KB |
author: pablo.srivaya

comments.content: It looks like **[New Baskerville](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180246/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=NewBaskerville%20-%20Roman&fid=c58396002b5f389d0b1e62f811b5f0df&fsize=60&text=QUALITAT&fit=1)** probably compressed to 80-90%

Thank you very much fvilanakis. Do you know where I can download that font? And do you know how I can compress it? I need to reproduce it.  
Thanks a lot!

This is commercial font and you can buy it here:  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=New%20Baskerville&sample\_text=QUALITAT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180246/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=New%20Baskerville&sample_text=QUALITAT "http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=New%20Baskerville&sample\_text=QUALITAT")  
or here:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search/%28New+Baskerville%29/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180246/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/%28New+Baskerville%29/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/%28New+Baskerville%29/fonts/")

With the term "compressing" I mean to make the letters narrower, which can be done on any typical illustrator application like Adobe Illustrator, CorelDraw or even an image processing application like Adobe Photoshop.
